#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    int T, N, i=0, temp;
    cin>>T;
    while(T-->0)
    {
        cin>>N;
        vector<int> A(N, 0);
        i=0;
        while(i<N)
        {
            cin>>A[i];
            i++;
        }
        sort(A.begin(), A.end());
        vector<int>::iterator it;

        int f=0;
        for(it = A.begin(), i=0; it!=A.end(); it++, i++)
        {
            if((i%2!=0)&&i<N-1)
            {
                temp = A[i];
                A[i] = A[i+1];
                A[i+1] = temp;
            }
        }

        for(it = A.begin(); it!= A.end(); it++)
        {
            cout<<*it<<" ";
        }
        cout<<endl;

    }
}
